title: Set up backend infrastructure with Node.js/Express for Railway deployment
description: Initialize a Node.js backend with Express framework that can be deployed to Railway's free tier. Include basic server setup, package.json configuration, and deployment config.

title: Design database schema for favor tracking system
description: Design database schema to store users, favor transactions, and balances. Choose appropriate database (PostgreSQL/SQLite) for Railway deployment. Include tables for users, favors history, and settings.

title: Implement REST API endpoints for favor operations
description: Create API endpoints: GET/POST /favors (list & create favors), GET /balance (current balance), POST /settle (settle up), GET /history (favor history with pagination). Include request validation and error handling.
